title: Anone
overview: A girl who lost her family and became separated from society can no longer figure out a way to live. The story begins when she meets an old woman. Deception and betrayal have hardened them to the point of no longer being able to believe in people. The two eventually realize that they feel the same way about many things, and the old woman shelters the girl. Theirs is a fake family and fake life, with fake memories. Suddenly, an incident occurs.
